What’s in it for you?

  1. Practical exercises with Lingaro’s top experts and experienced trainers.
  2. Real life enterprise technology knowledge.
  3. Fast entry into the professional IT world, even with no prior work experience!
  4. Fun!

 

The Bootcamp program will cover:

MS SQL in Week 1

  • SQL querying
  • Building data models
  • Data loading
  • Data transformation
  • A bonus module business communication/communication with the customer

Power BI in Week 2

  • Connecting, importing, and transforming data in Power BI Desktop
  • Using natural language queries
  • Visualizing data, authoring reports, and scheduling automated refreshes
  • Creating and sharing dashboards in Power BI Service
  • A bonus module about UX considerations when creating dashboards

ITIL Framework in Week 3

  • ITIL Definition
  • ITIL Cycle
  • ITIL’s relation to supporting products and services for our customers
  • ITIL Processes such as
    – Incident Management
    – Problem Management
    – Change Management
    – Continuous Improvement
